privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website or services.
privacyPolicy.informationContent: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and usage data.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseContent: We use your data to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityContent: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time.
privacyPolicy.changesToPolicyContent: We may update this policy periodically. The updated version will be posted here with a new "Last updated" date.
privacyPolicy.contactInfo: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.acceptanceContent: By using our services, you confirm that you are at least 13 years old and agree to these terms.
termsOfService.useOfServicesContent: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
termsOfService.intellectualPropertyContent: All content on this platform is owned by us or our licensors and is protected by copyright laws.
termsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityContent: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
termsOfService.modificationsContent: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
termsOfService.agreementNote: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions.

Stats.title: Our Numbers Speak for Themselves
Stats.subtitle: We are trusted by thousands of travelers worldwide. Explore our achievements.

contact.title: Contact Us
